name: Poppers (itch)
description:
Poppers is an evolving game with new iterations roughly every 6 months.

What it was:

  • Eating popcorn
  • Eating popcorn with a Windows XP wallpaper
  • Eating planets
  • Eating bees

What it is:

  • Eating skateboards

What will it be in 5 years:

  • Eating other things [CONFIRMED]
  • More than eating things [UNLIKELY]
  • Eating itself [LIKELY]

Art by @RoobertDoo 

Original concept by @RoobertDoo
